title: Weekend at Cradle Mountain
creator_contributor_role: Tasmanian Council for Children's Films and Television, production company
Children's Films and Television, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Tasmania - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cradle Mountain-Lake Saint Clair National Park (Tas.)

Places/Cradle Mountain-Lake Saint Clair National Park (Tas.)
description: Shows the children of a family spending a weekend at the chalet in Cradle Mountain Reserve going on two long walks past the mountain lakes, life at the chalet, the chalet keeper and the ranger, and their native pets. Cast: Margaret, Marcus and Duncan. Commentary by Nan Chauncey.
